entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac La Biche 1:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 56 %
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: SW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
